choices.label: All values in positions 0 through m are less than n.
All values in positions m+1 through numbers.length-1 are less than n.
All values in positions m+1 through numbers.length-1 are greater than or equal to n.
The largest value that is smaller than n is at position m.

content.answer: All values in positions m+1 through numbers.length-1 are greater than or equal to n.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
